Topic.Title: Tale of the Communist Frog Coup

Posts.EditableText:
This is my first text adventure game, but I think it came out pretty well. It's pretty short. You have to escape prison and start a revolution, and the choices you make affect the story slightly.

Here it is, if anyone wants to try it: 
https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/33ebioponkqcmmkafxybwq/tale-of-the-communist-frog-coup
